eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:QC1}
 \{Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1),\,Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1)\}&=&
    2\{Q_{\rm B},\,C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2 e^{2h})\},\nonumber\\
 \{Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1),\,C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2 e^h)\}&=&
   \{Q_{\rm B},\,C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2(e^{2h}-e^h))\},
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:QC2}
 \left(Q_{\rm R}(e^h-1)\,A\right)*B=-(-1)^{\left| A \right|}\,
A*\left(Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1)\,B\right), \nonumber\\
 \left(C_{\rm R}((\partial h)^2 e^h)\,
A\right)*B=-(-1)^{\left| A \right|}\,A*\left(
C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2 e^h)\,B\right).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:QC3}
  (Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1)+
Q_{\rm R}(e^h-1))\,I=0,\ \ \ 
  (C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2 e^h)+
C_{\rm R}((\partial h)^2 e^h))\,I=0.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
 Q_{\rm B}\Psi_0&=&-\{Q_{\rm B},\,C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2 e^h)\}I, \nonumber\\
 \Psi_0*\Psi_0&=&
  \left(Q_{\rm L}(e^h-1)-C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2e^h)\right)^2 I
   = \{Q_{\rm B},\,C_{\rm L}((\partial h)^2e^h)\} I.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:L2state}
 L^{\rm mat}_{-2} \left| \eta_0 \right> &=& \frac{1}{2} \left| \eta_1 \right>, \nonumber\\
 L^{\rm mat}_{-2} \left| \eta_1 \right> &=& 2 \left| \eta_3 \right> + \frac{1}{2} \left| \eta_5 \right>,\nonumber\\
 L^{\rm mat}_{-2} \left| \eta_3 \right> &=& 3 \left| \eta_6 \right> + \left| \eta_8 \right>
                             +\frac{1}{2} \left| \eta_9 \right>,\nonumber\\
 L^{\rm mat}_{-2} \left| \eta_4 \right> &=& 4 \left| \eta_7 \right> + \left| \eta_{10 \right>}, \nonumber\\
 L^{\rm mat}_{-2} \left| \eta_5 \right> &=& 4 \left| \eta_9 \right> + \frac{1}{2} \left| \eta_{12 \right>}, \nonumber\\
 \left(L^{\rm gh}_{-2}-2 q_{-2}\right) \left| \chi_0 \right> &=&
   -\left| \chi_1 \right>, \nonumber\\
 \left(L^{\rm gh}_{-2}-2 q_{-2}\right) \left| \chi_1 \right> &=&
   3\left| \chi_4 \right> +\left| \chi_6 \right>, \nonumber\\
 \left(L^{\rm gh}_{-2}-2 q_{-2}\right) \left| \chi_4 \right> &=&
  5\left| \chi_7 \right> + \left| \chi_9 \right>, \nonumber\\
 \left(L^{\rm gh}_{-2}-2 q_{-2}\right) \left| \chi_5 \right> &=&
  4\left| \chi_8 \right>+2\left| \chi_{10 \right>}+\left| \chi_{12 \right>}, \nonumber\\
 \left(L^{\rm gh}_{-2}-2 q_{-2}\right) \left| \chi_6 \right> &=&
  3\left| \chi_9 \right>+3\left| \chi_{11 \right>}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& 2\pi^2\left(
  -\frac{1}{2}\lambda(a)\,t^2
+ 26\,(1 + a + 4 a Z(a))\,\psi_1^2-
\frac{1}{2}\,(1 + a + 4 a 
Z(a))\,\psi_2^2\right.\\
&&\left. + 
13 a\,t\,\psi_1 + \frac{1}{2}a\,t\,\psi_2 
\right).
\

\begin{eqnarray}
L_{-4}^{\rm mat} \left| \eta_0 \right>&=&
\left| \eta_3 \right>+\frac{1}{2}\left| \eta_4 \right>,
\nonumber\\
L_{-4}^{\rm mat} \left| \eta_1 \right>&=&
\left| \eta_9 \right>+\left| \eta_6 \right>+\frac{1}{2}\left| \eta_{10 \right>},
\nonumber\\
\left(
L_{-4}^{\rm gh}-4q_{-4}\right)\left| \chi_0 \right>&=&
-3\left| \chi_4 \right>-2\left| \chi_5 \right>-\left| \chi_6 \right>,
\nonumber\\
\left(
L_{-4}^{\rm gh}-4q_{-4}\right)\left| \chi_1 \right>&=&
5\left| \chi_7 \right>+\left| \chi_{11 \right>}+2\left| \chi_{12 \right>}.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\label{Eq:Cha}
 C((\partial h_a)^2 e^{h_a}) &=& 
-8a Z(a) \sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty c_n
\int_{-\pi}^\pi \frac{d\sigma}{2\pi}\,e^{-in\sigma} \sin^2 2\sigma \nonumber\\
&&+8a \sum_{n=-\infty}^\infty c_n
\sum_{m=2}^\infty (-1)^m Z(a)^m
\int_{-\pi}^\pi \frac{d\sigma}{2\pi}\,e^{-in\sigma} \sin 2m\sigma
\sin 2\sigma.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
C((\partial h_a)^2 e^{h_a}) &=& 
-8a Z(a) \left(\frac{1}{2}c_0-\frac{1}{4}(c_4+c_{-4})\right) \nonumber\\
&&
+8a \sum_{m=2}^\infty (-1)^m Z(a)^m
\left(
\frac{1}{4}(c_{2(m-1)}+c_{-2(m-1)})\right.\nonumber\\
&&
\hspace{1cm}
\left.
-\frac{1}{4}
(c_{2(m+1)}+c_{-2(m+1)})\right)\nonumber\\
&=& -4aZ(a) c_0 +2a Z(a)^2(c_2+c_{-2})\nonumber\\
&&+2a(1-Z(a)^2)\sum_{n=2}^\infty
(-1)^n Z(a)^{n-1}(c_{2n}+c_{-2n}).
\label{Eq:Qsecond}
\
